thread.title: BRIEF-First Mid Illinois Bancshares Announces Closing Date For Pending Merger And Declares Special Dividend

title: BRIEF-First Mid Illinois Bancshares Announces Closing Date For Pending Merger And Declares Special Dividend

organizations.name: brief-first mid illinois bancshares announces clos

text:
April 13, 2018 / 1:06 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-First Mid Illinois Bancshares Announces Closing Date For Pending Merger And Declares Special Dividend Reuters Staff 
April 13 (Reuters) - First Mid-Illinois Bancshares Inc : 
* ILLINOIS BANCSHARES, INC. ANNOUNCES CLOSING DATE FOR PENDING MERGER AND DECLARES SPECIAL DIVIDEND 
* CLOSING DATE FOR MERGER OF FIRST BANCTRUST CORP IS EXPECTED TO BE MAY 1, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
